title: Exercise 3-3
description: The decimal fraction of WD customers outside the Bay Area is

questions.name: fraction_wd_outside_bay
questions.title: The decimal fraction of WD customers outside the Bay Area is (Enter a decimal value)

validators.text: Please enter a value between 0.06 and 0.061.

questions.description: WD has 8 customers outside the Bay Area, and 132 customers overall, so the (decimal) fraction that are outside the Bay Area is 8/132 = 0.0606.
